message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you our premium product, and I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $20000. It's a great value, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. My counteroffer for the product would be $15000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal. However, I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you the product for $18000. It's a great price, and I think you'll find it's still a great value.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. After considering your latest offer, I believe I can come to an agreement. My counteroffer for the product would be $17000.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $17500. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's still a great value.
I'm glad we're finding common ground, Alice. After reviewing your last offer, I believe we can reach an agreement. My counteroffer for the product would be $16500.
Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer you the product for $16750. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's still a great value.
I appreciate your efforts to reach an agreement, Alice. After considering your latest offer, I believe we can come to a reasonable price. My counteroffer for the product would be $16250.
